channel.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
channel.description:
[url]https://kotaku.com/5560005/new-mortal-kombat-coming-will-be-gory[/url]
[url]https://kotaku.com/5560010/the-new-mortal-kombat-trailer-is-pure-brutality[/url]
Second link is trailer.
It sure does look like a return to roots.

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
YAY! The very first game series I was ever addicted to is back to it’s old game style. Thanks for the post.
Only downside is I might have to turn my Xbox back on to play it.

Read full topic
item.source: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
Can somebody pass me a towel? I jizzed all over my screen when I saw the trailer.

Read full topic
item.source: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
The only Reason I say that Jax, Sonya, and Johnny Cage suck is because they didn’t have abilities that really stood out.
Jax just had an overabundance of muscle in his upper-body (sometimes the arms were Robotic), Sonya was Eye candy, and if I had a dime for every time Johnny cage (when I played) was Fatality’ed, I’d be a few bucks richer.
Whereas Raiden, Kitana, Mileena, Baraka, Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Kung Lao, Shang Tsung, Liu Kang,and Reptile all had Extraordinary abilities that were beyond cool. (I know I just named off only the playable characters of MKII, available from the beginning of the game but that’s all I could really remember)
I particularly HATE kano, reason being, he’s a freakin’ cheater (guns AND cybernetic eye, I call Hacks).

Read full topic
item.source: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Jax does indeed suck.

Kabal, now he’s a champ. He’s one of the three things that MK3 did right (Kabal, Cyrax and Sektor).

Read full topic

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Just watched the trailer and holy mother of Raptor Jesus, if they make this into a feature-length film, I would watch it.
Even if Jax, Sonya, and Johnny Cage aren’t in it (those three sucked anyway)
I think it would do better in theaters than any of its predecessors.

Read full topic
item.source: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
TheeGoatPig:

Unless you are one of those weirdos that bought a controller for your machine[COLOR=‘Black’] (weirdo).

Racing games make so much more sense with an analog controller. RBR for example.

Maxey:

There were MK games on the PC up until MK4, then they just didn’t make anymore MK games for the PC.

Where can I find some info on these? And don’t tell me to google it, please, I’m doing it as we speak… er… read, NO, write, NO …I don’t know runs away

[edit] This page has info on the older MK games, if anyone’s interested.

Read full topic
item.source: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: Charchar
item.description:
TheeGoatPig:

I thought fighting games sucked on the PC? Unless you are one of those weirdos that bought a controller for your machine[COLOR=‘Black’] (weirdo).

Wtf are you talking about? Haha, don’t you know about Emulators? or, Street fighter IV?

Since when is it weird to buy an USB controller? O_O

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
God, I remember playing MK3 Ultimate on my friends Sega megadrive 2. 16bit POWERRR!!! We were fuckin’ addicted to that game. This looks pretty awesome actually, could be fun on the interwebz.

[edit] PS3? xbox? no pc? :fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu:

item.title: New Mortal Kombat game announced, trailer available
item.dc:creator: vivanto
item.description:
Good, that they are going back to 2d based playing field.

Looking at the video however, I just hope they won’t screw it up with bad camera vs controls movement, which is the death of too many console games.
